Entry.JapaneseText: [VARIABLE]
Entry.EnglishText: [VARIABLE]

Entry.JapaneseText: 駅員
Entry.EnglishText: Station Attendant

Entry.JapaneseText: select
Entry.EnglishText: Select

Entry.JapaneseText: 女の子
Entry.EnglishText: Girl

Entry.JapaneseText: 女の人
Entry.EnglishText: Woman

Entry.JapaneseText: カレギア兵
Entry.EnglishText: Callegean Soldier

Entry.JapaneseText: <Claire>
Entry.EnglishText: <Claire>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>
Entry.EnglishText: <Tytree>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Mao>
Entry.EnglishText: <Mao>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Eugene>
Entry.EnglishText: <Eugene>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Annie>
Entry.EnglishText: <Annie>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Hilda>
Entry.EnglishText: <Hilda>

Entry.JapaneseText: 首都バルカ
Entry.EnglishText: Capital City Balka

Entry.JapaneseText: 首都バルカ
Entry.EnglishText: Capital City Balka

Entry.JapaneseText: 道具屋
Entry.EnglishText: Item Shop

Entry.JapaneseText: 道具屋
Entry.EnglishText: Item Shop

Entry.JapaneseText: <font:80000002>バルカ鉄道は、無料で ご利用いただけます。 ご乗車になりますか？
Entry.EnglishText: <font:80000002>The Balka Railway is free of charge. Would you like to take a ride?

Entry.JapaneseText: 南門広場
Entry.EnglishText: South Gate

Entry.JapaneseText: 西門前
Entry.EnglishText: West Gate

Entry.JapaneseText: カレギア城前
Entry.EnglishText: Callegea Castle

Entry.JapaneseText: 商店前
Entry.EnglishText: General Store

Entry.JapaneseText: 鉄道に乗らない
Entry.EnglishText: Don't Ride

Entry.JapaneseText: わたち、ヨッツアの事 ちってる！
Entry.EnglishText: I know Yotza!

Entry.JapaneseText: いっつもヘンテコな話ばっかり ちてくれるんだよ！
Entry.EnglishText: He's always telling me the strangest stories!

Entry.JapaneseText: わたち、儀式に女王様に お花を捧げる役目になったの。
Entry.EnglishText: I've been given the honor of offering flowers to Her Majesty during the ceremony.

Entry.JapaneseText: 今からキンチョーしてるの…… ソソウちたらどうちよう……
Entry.EnglishText: I have butterflies in my stomach... What if I mess up...

Entry.JapaneseText: あくとーが女王様の命をねらって お城に入り込んだんだって……！
Entry.EnglishText: Apparently some evil people snuck into the castle and tried to kill the Queen!

Entry.JapaneseText: あなたたちは……
Entry.EnglishText: You guys...

Entry.JapaneseText: あくとーには…… 見えないわね……
Entry.EnglishText: Don't seem to be evil...

Entry.JapaneseText: わたち、ガジュマはキライ…… よくわかんないけど、イヤ！
Entry.EnglishText: I hate Gajuma... I don't know why, but I hate them!

Entry.JapaneseText: わたちが儀式で活躍する ケッテー的シュンカンを みんなに見てもらうはず だったのに……
Entry.EnglishText: I was hoping everyone would get to see my big moment during the inauguration ceremony...

Entry.JapaneseText: 儀式がチューシになって、 残念……
Entry.EnglishText: But they canceled it... That's too bad...

Entry.JapaneseText: わたち、なんかね、このごろ ガジュマのおともだちと 遊ぶのがイヤなの……
Entry.EnglishText: My Gajuma friends haven't wanted to play with me lately...

Entry.JapaneseText: ケンカもちてないのに どうちてかなぁ……
Entry.EnglishText: We didn't get into a fight, so I don't know what happened.

Entry.JapaneseText: わたち、ガジュマはキライ…… よくわかんないけど、イヤ！
Entry.EnglishText: I hate Gajuma... I don't know why, but I hate them!

Entry.JapaneseText: おとうちゃんが言ってたよ！ ガジュマはヒューマを いじめるって！
Entry.EnglishText: My daddy told me that Gajuma like to bully Huma!

Entry.JapaneseText: だから、わたち、 ガジュマなんかと 仲良くちないもん！
Entry.EnglishText: That's why I can't be friends with Gajuma!

Entry.JapaneseText: 女王様やジルバ様は、 ヒューマをキライなんだって おとうちゃんが言ってたよ！
Entry.EnglishText: Daddy told me that Lady Zilva and the Queen hate Huma!

Entry.JapaneseText: だから、何かあるとすぐに へーたいさんが、ヒューマを 捕まえるんだって！
Entry.EnglishText: He said that soldiers will arrrest all the Huma if something happens!

Entry.JapaneseText: おとうちゃんがね、 ガジュマの悪口を言うと ほめてくれるんだよ！
Entry.EnglishText: My daddy always praises me when I say bad things about Gajuma!

Entry.JapaneseText: だから、わたちいつも ガジュマの悪口を言ってるの！
Entry.EnglishText: That's why I'm always saying bad things about Gajuma!

Entry.JapaneseText: 街はずれの商店なら、 機関ちゃに乗らないと。
Entry.EnglishText: If you wanna visit the store on the outskirts of town, then you'll need to ride the train.

Entry.JapaneseText: この前ね、お星さまが いっぱい降って来たの！
Entry.EnglishText: I saw a lot of stars falling out of the sky the other day!

Entry.JapaneseText: そちたらね、ガジュマの事、 イヤじゃなくなったの……
Entry.EnglishText: After that, I didn't hate Gajuma like I used to...

Entry.JapaneseText: でも、おとうちゃんは ずーっとガジュマがキライなの…… どうちてかな……？
Entry.EnglishText: But my daddy has always hated Gajuma... I wonder why...?

Entry.JapaneseText: この前ね、お星さまが いっぱい降って来たの！
Entry.EnglishText: I saw a lot of stars falling out of the sky the other day!

Entry.JapaneseText: そちたらね、ガジュマの事、 イヤじゃなくなったの……
Entry.EnglishText: After that, I didn't hate Gajuma like I used to...

Entry.JapaneseText: でも、おとうちゃんは ずーっとガジュマがキライなの…… どうちてかな……？
Entry.EnglishText: But my daddy has always hated Gajuma... I wonder why...?

Entry.JapaneseText: ねえ、この音はいつ終わるの？ うるさいから、わたち、 お昼寝ができないの……
Entry.EnglishText: Hey, when will this loud noise stop? It's so loud, I can't take my nap...

Entry.JapaneseText: おとうちゃんが、ラジルダが ホーカイちたって…… ホーカイってなあに？
Entry.EnglishText: My daddy said that Razilda was a-nigh-lated... What does that mean?

Entry.JapaneseText: ねえ、どうして大人のヒトたちは ケンカばっかりしてるの？
Entry.EnglishText: Why are the grownups always fighting?

Entry.JapaneseText: みんなでバイラスを やっつけないとダメだって、 わたち、思うんだけどなぁ……
Entry.EnglishText: We all have to work together to stop the Biruses... At least, that's what I think...

Entry.JapaneseText: この街は日当たりが悪いけど、 ちゃんとお手入れしてれば、 草木もちゃんと育つのよ。
Entry.EnglishText: We don't get a lot of sun here, but if you take care to tend to the plants, they'll grow.

Entry.JapaneseText: さっき、そこの駅から ちっちゃな男の子みたいな ガジュマが汽車に乗ってったわ。
Entry.EnglishText: I saw a young-looking Gajuma board the train just now.

Entry.JapaneseText: 何をそんなに 慌ててたのかしらねえ……
Entry.EnglishText: He looked like he was in a hurry. I wonder why...

Entry.JapaneseText: あなたも女王陛下の お披露目の儀式を……？
Entry.EnglishText: Are you attending Her Majesty's inauguration ceremony?

Entry.JapaneseText: ミーハーな人の多い事……
Entry.EnglishText: I guess everyone and their mother wants to see it...

Entry.JapaneseText: あなたたちは…… 怪しくはないわね。
Entry.EnglishText: You guys don't seem suspicious...

Entry.JapaneseText: いえね、怪しい人がいたら、 すぐに軍に通報するように 言われてるのよ。
Entry.EnglishText: Well, we were told to report any suspicious individuals to the military.

Entry.JapaneseText: 儀式で何かあったら大変だし、 軍もかなりピリピリしてるわ。
Entry.EnglishText: It would be a disaster if anything were to happen during the ceremony, so the army is on edge.

Entry.JapaneseText: 不快！ 不快だわ……！
Entry.EnglishText: You're making me uncomfortable!

Entry.JapaneseText: 近寄らないでくれる？ ガジュマのニオイがするだけで 気分が悪くなるの！
Entry.EnglishText: Would you mind staying away from me? Just the smell of Gajuma makes me want to retch!
Entry.Notes: Literal translation "stay away, will you? The smell of Gajuma makes me sick!"

Entry.JapaneseText: よくよく考えたら、 どうして、カレギアの王様は ガジュマなの？
Entry.EnglishText: I've been thinking about this for a while, but why is the ruler of Callegea a Gajuma?

Entry.JapaneseText: そういう役目こそ、 ヒューマにふさわしい はずなのに……
Entry.EnglishText: You'd think a Huma would be much better suited for such a prestigious role...

Entry.JapaneseText: あんた、ガジュマなんかと 一緒にいると、ガジュマくさいのが うつっちゃうわよ！
Entry.EnglishText: You'll start reeking of Gajuma if you keep sticking around them!

Entry.JapaneseText: 不快！ 不快だわ……！
Entry.EnglishText: You're making me uncomfortable!

Entry.JapaneseText: 近寄らないでくれる？ ガジュマのニオイがするだけで 気分が悪くなるの！
Entry.EnglishText: Would you mind staying away from me? Just the smell of Gajuma makes me want to retch!

Entry.JapaneseText: どうしてかしら…… ガジュマの事が憎くて たまらないの……！
Entry.EnglishText: I'm not sure why, but I just can't stand Gajuma!

Entry.JapaneseText: 心の中で、誰かが 「ガジュマを憎め、殺せ！」って 言ってるような気がするの……
Entry.EnglishText: I feel like there's a little voice in my head telling me "Hate all Gajuma, kill them all!"

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマが何だって言うの！ ヒューマはガジュマなんかに 負けやしないわよ！
Entry.EnglishText: You Gajuma can say whatever you want! We Huma will never be beaten by the likes of you!

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマなんて…… ガジュマなんて滅べば いいのよ……！
Entry.EnglishText: You Gajuma should all be eradicated...!

Entry.JapaneseText: あのジルバってお偉いさんが 何を言ったか知らないけどね、 ガジュマが調子に乗るんじゃないわよ！
Entry.EnglishText: I don't give a damn about what Zilva had to say, but those Gajuma better not get cocky!
Entry.Notes: 調子に乗る = to get caught up in the moment, get carried away, get cocky. Unlcear just how "angry" this woman is about this particular moment. Double check in context.

Entry.JapaneseText: どうしてかしら…… ガジュマの事が憎くて たまらないの……！
Entry.EnglishText: I'm not sure why, but I just can't stand Gajuma!

Entry.JapaneseText: 心の中で、誰かが 「ガジュマを憎め、殺せ！」って 言ってるような気がするの……
Entry.EnglishText: I feel like there's a little voice in my head telling me "Hate all Gajuma, kill them all!"

Entry.JapaneseText: でも、なんだか怖い…… この気持ちが、本当に自分の ものなのかどうか、わからないの。
Entry.EnglishText: But it scares me somewhat... I don't know if these thoughts are truly mine.

Entry.JapaneseText: 病気の人？ それって…… 街の広場にいた……ガジュマ……
Entry.EnglishText: Someone is ill at the plaza? And they're a Gajuma...?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……のわけ、ないわよね？
Entry.EnglishText: ...So what do you care?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……ガジュマとは 話したくないね。
Entry.EnglishText: I have no desire to talk to a Gajuma.

Entry.JapaneseText: ついこの前まで、私はどうかしてたわ。 ガジュマを殺してやりたいなんて……
Entry.EnglishText: To think I wanted to kill Gajuma... I must have been out of my mind...

Entry.JapaneseText: でも、そういう私に対する ガジュマの態度や言葉でわかったの…… 私たちはお互いに憎み合ってたんだって。
Entry.EnglishText: But the way Gajuma have been speaking to me and the way they act towards me has made me realize that we do hate each other...

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマとガジュマの共存なんて うわべだけだったのよ……
Entry.EnglishText: Coexistence between Huma and Gajuma was nothing but a fantasy...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……ガジュマとは 話したくないね。
Entry.EnglishText: I have no desire to talk to a Gajuma.

Entry.JapaneseText: ついこの前まで、私はどうかしてたわ。 ガジュマを殺してやりたいなんて……
Entry.EnglishText: To think I wanted to kill Gajuma... I must have been out of my mind...

Entry.JapaneseText: でも、そういう私に対する ガジュマの態度や言葉でわかったの…… 私たちはお互いに憎み合ってたんだって。
Entry.EnglishText: But the way Gajuma have been speaking to me and the way they act towards me has made me realize that we do hate each other...

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマとガジュマの共存なんて うわべだけだったのよ……
Entry.EnglishText: Coexistence between Huma and Gajuma was nothing but a fantasy...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……ガジュマとは 話したくないね。
Entry.EnglishText: I have no desire to talk to a Gajuma.

Entry.JapaneseText: この地鳴り……どこから 聞こえて来るのかしら…… どうにも不気味ね……
Entry.EnglishText: I wonder which direction I'm hearing these tremors come from... I'm beginning to worry...

Entry.JapaneseText: ラジルダが波に飲まれたそうよ。 あの街のガジュマって ヒューマ差別主義者ばかりよね。
Entry.EnglishText: I heard that Razilda was wiped out by a tsunami... That village was full of anti-Huma Gajuma.

Entry.JapaneseText: 少しは世の中もマシになるかも しれないわね……！
Entry.EnglishText: Perhaps the world is better off now!

Entry.JapaneseText: ラジルダが波に飲まれたって…… あの街のヒューマが心配ね……
Entry.EnglishText: I heard that Razilda was wiped out by a tsunami... I worry for the Huma that lived there...

Entry.JapaneseText: こんな時にガジュマが ヒューマのあたしに何の用!?
Entry.EnglishText: What could a Gajuma possibly want with a Huma?!

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマが先に逃げようとして ヒューマが何人もバイラスの犠牲に なったそうよ！
Entry.EnglishText: I heard that Gajuma are trying to escape first and leaving Huma to be massacred by Biruses!

Entry.JapaneseText: あんたたちも早く逃げなさい！ ガジュマの犠牲にならないうちにね！
Entry.EnglishText: You need to get out of here! Before you become victims of the Gajuma as well!

Entry.JapaneseText: この街は霧の日が多いから、 たまには日当たりのいいところで リゾート気分に浸りたいわね。
Entry.EnglishText: It's always foggy around here, so I want to go to a sunny resort town.

Entry.JapaneseText: たとえば、ミナールとか サニイタウンとかね。
Entry.EnglishText: You know, like Minal or Sunnytown.

Entry.JapaneseText: お披露目の儀式が無事に 終わるまでは、何事にも 油断はできんのだ。
Entry.EnglishText: Until the inauguration ceremony has concluded, we cannot let our guard down.

Entry.JapaneseText: 我輩の目が黒いうちは どんな犯罪者も見逃さんのだ。
Entry.EnglishText: So long as I draw breath, no criminal shall be able to evade justice!
Entry.Notes: 我輩（わがはい） is an arrogant "me" or "I," and "目が黒いうち” is an expression that means "while I'm alive" or "as long as a I live." So, I decided to have a bit of fun with this arrogant soldier. If it doesn't work, you can use a more "grounded" translation. "As long as I am alive, no criminal shall escape judgement" or something.

Entry.JapaneseText: この警備の中、 何か悪さをしようとて、 どうにもなるまい。
Entry.EnglishText: No one will be able to get away with committing crimes with security as tight as it is.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Would you like to rest? Yes No

Entry.JapaneseText: 早く……薬を 届けてあげないと……
Entry.EnglishText: I need to hurry up and deliver the medicine...

Entry.JapaneseText: 薬……誰か薬がどこにあるか、 知ってる人はいないかしら……
Entry.EnglishText: There has to be someone around here who knows where I can find medicine...

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0>『サイユーキ』 お披露目の儀式記念上演！ <Yellow>ヒト<White>の心を持ったおしゃべりな パンチモンキーが、ブタのバイラス、 カワウソのバイラスとともに 西の果てを目指す大冒険活劇。 前売り券絶賛発売中！
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0>- Sojourn to the West - Announcing a performance to commemorate the inauguration ceremony! A talkative Punch Monkey with a Human heart, together with a pig Birus and an otter Birus, go on an action packed adventure to the edge of the west! Advance tickets are on sale now!

Entry.JapaneseText: おおっ、「サイユーキ」！ このお芝居、大好きなんだよなぁ！ ペトナジャンカ公演の時は、 毎日見たもんなぁ……
Entry.EnglishText: Oh, 'Soujorn to the West'! I love this play! When it was performed in Petnadjanka, I went every single day...

Entry.JapaneseText: おしゃべりなパンチモンキー…… <Tytree>みたいだな……
Entry.EnglishText: A talkative Punch Monkey... That sounds like Tytree...

Entry.JapaneseText: へえ、このお芝居、 一年前もやってたけど、 人気なんだネ。
Entry.EnglishText: Oh, they did this play a year ago as well. It sure seems popular.

Entry.JapaneseText: ボクは歌手のほうが やってみたいかも？
Entry.EnglishText: I wonder if I should try out to be a singer?

Entry.JapaneseText: うむ……芝居も久しく 見てないな……
Entry.EnglishText: Hm... It's been a while since I've seen a play...

Entry.JapaneseText: これに出演してる役者さん、 年齢よりも二十歳は若く見えるって 聞いたけど……いくつなのかしら。
Entry.EnglishText: I've heard that the actors in this play appear twenty years younger than their actual age... I wonder how old they are.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……サーカスは やってないのかしら？
Entry.EnglishText: So I take it the circus is in town?
